description:
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/chillmaze/xenon-blade-survival-hack-and-slash

-------------------------------------------

Xenon Blade is an isometric hack and slash game, you are cyborg ninja fights hordes of futuristic robots that prevents you progressing further, You are equipped with high-tech weapons which can be upgraded to ease your way through enemy waves.

---------------- Controls ---------------

w,a,s,d - move

space - dash

left click - light attack

right click - heavy attack
